text: Young Guns II is an American Western movie. It is a sequel to Young Guns. Young Guns was made in 1988, and Young Guns II was made in 1990. This movie stars Emilio Estevez, Kiefer Sutherland, Lou Diamond Phillips, and Christian Slater. Another actor is William Petersen as Pat Garrett. It was written and produced by John Fusco. It was directed by Geoff Murphy. It is about Billy the Kid. ==Other websites== * * Category:1990 movies Category:1990s Western (genre) movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Geoff Murphy Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New Mexico
title: Young Guns II
